name: Cardlike
description:
Cardlike is a combination of a traditional roguelike and a card game. Pick one of the three different classes, build your deck, find powerful items, destroy your enemies and try to defeat all five bosses across four unique biomes. Try it out and see how far you can go into the randomly generated dungeon before you!

Attack your opponents by using cards you collected!



As you dive deeper into the dungeon build your deck along the way!



Play as one of the 3 unique characters with completely different playstyles and abilities



Randomly generated dungeons make every run fun and special!



The game may be difficult, but it's fair.
